title: ellA mathangaLilum
sahitya:
ellA mathangaLilum ellA vidhangaLilum ilagum paramporuLE


anupallavi

  nallA ragattinilum pollA ragattinilum nAnennum tattuvamAna svayamjyOtiyE


caraNam    peyarvaDi vAdiya bhEdam kaDandanai peN AN aliyenum pirivinai aTranai
ayarvara pala kOTi aNDangaLai Alum arasE nin jnAna murasena vAzhuvEn
